posts.content:
Women's strength is demonstrated through their resilience in the face of challenges, their ability to overcome obstacles, and their contributions to various aspects of society. Their ability to navigate challenges with grace, nurture relationships, and contribute to the betterment of communities highlights the invaluable strength that women bring to every aspect of life. 
May we continue to strive for gender equality and empower women to reach new heights.

posts.content: 470 jets from both Airbus and Boeing ! That is an eclectic mix of multiple aircraft variants. Maintenance, network expansion, transformation,training and customer service augmentation will be critical factors for success but for now, what will suffice is - Bravo Air India !
